text: Sean Pertwee (born 4 June 1964) is an English actor. He is the son of actor Jon Pertwee. In 2014, Pertwee was cast as Alfred Pennyworth in the TV series Gotham. Pertwee was born in London, England. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from London
title: Sean Pertwee
